query.name: 买方保理——买方付款发票查询
query.desc: 买方保理——买方付款发票查询

qnode.name: node name
qnode.condition: a.cntrctNo='$cntrctNo$' and a.buyerId = '$buyerId$' and a.selId = '$selId$' and a.busiTp = '$busiTp$' and a.invLoanBal > 0 and (a.sysTrxSts='M' or (a.sysLockBy = '$sysLockBy$' and a.sysLockFlag = 'T')) and a.sysRefNo = b.invRef and b.invcLoanId = c.sysRefNo
qnode.sql: select a.sysRefNo,a.cntrctNo,c.sysRefNo,a.invNo,a.invCcy,a.invBal,a.invLoanBal,a.invValDt,a.invDueDt,c.loanRt,c.loanValDt,a.loanPerc,a.invLoanAval,b.sysRefNo from InvcM a,InvcLoanM b,LoanM c
